post.summary: KeywordSearch can search for any product in the Digi-Key catalog.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: OAuth Bearer Token. Please see<a href= "https://developer.digikey.com/documentation/oauth" target= "_blank" > OAuth 2.0 Documentation </a > page for more info.

parameters.name: X-DIGIKEY-Client-Id
parameters.description: The Client Id for your App.

parameters.name: X-DIGIKEY-Locale-Site
parameters.description: Two letter code for Digi-Key product website to search on. Different countries sites have different part restrictions, supported languages, and currencies. Acceptable values include: US, CA, JP, UK, DE, AT, BE, DK, FI, GR, IE, IT, LU, NL, NO, PT, ES, KR, HK, SG, CN, TW, AU, FR, IN, NZ, SE, MX, CH, IL, PL, SK, SI, LV, LT, EE, CZ, HU, BG, MY, ZA, RO, TH, PH.

parameters.name: X-DIGIKEY-Locale-Language
parameters.description: Two letter code for language to search on. Langauge must be supported by the selected site. If searching on keyword, this language is used to find matches. Acceptable values include: en, ja, de, fr, ko, zhs, zht, it, es, he, nl, sv, pl, fi, da, no.

parameters.name: X-DIGIKEY-Locale-Currency
parameters.description: Three letter code for Currency to return part pricing for. Currency must be supported by the selected site. Acceptable values include: USD, CAD, JPY, GBP, EUR, HKD, SGD, TWD, KRW, AUD, NZD, INR, DKK, NOK, SEK, ILS, CNY, PLN, CHF, CZK, HUF, RON, ZAR, MYR, THB, PHP.

parameters.name: X-DIGIKEY-Customer-Id
parameters.description: Your Digi-Key Customer id. If your account has multiple Customer Ids for different regions, this allows you to select one of them.

400.description: Bad Request - The input model is invalid or malformed.

401.description: Unauthorized - Token is expired or Client Id or subscription are invalid.

404.description: Not Found - The requested resource could not be found

429.description: Too Many Requests - Your rate limit has been exceeded

503.description: Service Unavailable - The service is temporarily unavailable

get.summary: Retrieve detailed product information including real time pricing and availability.
get.description:
Works best with a Digi-Key product number. Some manufacturer product numbers conflict with unrelated products and
may not
return the correct product.
Locale information is required in the headers for accurate pricing and currencies. Locale defaults to United
States.

parameters.name: productNumber
parameters.description: The product to retrieve details for.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: OAuth Bearer Token. Please see<a href= "https://developer.digikey.com/documentation/oauth" target= "_blank" > OAuth 2.0 Documentation </a > page for more info.

parameters.name: X-DIGIKEY-Client-Id
parameters.description: The Client Id for your App.

parameters.name: X-DIGIKEY-Locale-Site
parameters.description: Two letter code for Digi-Key product website to search on. Different countries sites have different part restrictions, supported languages, and currencies. Acceptable values include: US, CA, JP, UK, DE, AT, BE, DK, FI, GR, IE, IT, LU, NL, NO, PT, ES, KR, HK, SG, CN, TW, AU, FR, IN, NZ, SE, MX, CH, IL, PL, SK, SI, LV, LT, EE, CZ, HU, BG, MY, ZA, RO, TH, PH.

parameters.name: X-DIGIKEY-Locale-Language
parameters.description: Two letter code for language to search on. Langauge must be supported by the selected site. If searching on keyword, this language is used to find matches. Acceptable values include: en, ja, de, fr, ko, zhs, zht, it, es, he, nl, sv, pl, fi, da, no.

parameters.name: X-DIGIKEY-Locale-Currency
parameters.description: Three letter code for Currency to return part pricing for. Currency must be supported by the selected site. Acceptable values include: USD, CAD, JPY, GBP, EUR, HKD, SGD, TWD, KRW, AUD, NZD, INR, DKK, NOK, SEK, ILS, CNY, PLN, CHF, CZK, HUF, RON, ZAR, MYR, THB, PHP.

get.summary: Calculate the DigiReel pricing for the given DigiKeyProductNumber and RequestedQuantity

parameters.name: productNumber
parameters.description:
The Digi-Key ProductNumber requested for Digi-Reel price calculation. It must be a
Digi-Key Product number that is for a Digi-Reel pack type.

parameters.name: requestedQuantity
parameters.description:
The quantity of the product you are looking to create a Digi-Reel with. Must be greater
than 0.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: OAuth Bearer Token. Please see<a href= "https://developer.digikey.com/documentation/oauth" target= "_blank" > OAuth 2.0 Documentation </a > page for more info.

get.summary: Returns a list of recommended products for the given Product number.

parameters.name: productNumber
parameters.description: The Product being searched for

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of records to be returned

parameters.name: searchOptionList
parameters.description:
A comma delimited list of filters that can be used to limit results. Available filters
are the following: LeadFree, CollapsePackingTypes, ExcludeNonStock, Has3DModel, InStock, ManufacturerPartSearch,
NewProductsOnly, RoHSCompliant.

parameters.name: excludeMarketPlaceProducts
parameters.description: Used to exclude MarkPlace products from search results. Default is false

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: OAuth Bearer Token. Please see<a href= "https://developer.digikey.com/documentation/oauth" target= "_blank" > OAuth 2.0 Documentation </a > page for more info.

parameters.description: The Client Id for your App.

get.summary:
Provide a product number and quantity to receive product information such as pricing, available quantity, and the
best
packaging type for the requested quantity of the product.
For example, given a requested quantity larger than a standard reel, this will return information about the
standard tape and reel as well as either cut tape or DKR depending on the provided preference.
Made for Cut Tape, Tape and Reel, and Digi-Reel products only. Other packaging types can be searched for, but
results may vary.
Locale information is required in the headers for accurate pricing and currencies. Locale defaults to United
States.

parameters.name: productNumber
parameters.description:
A product number. Can be either Digi-Key or Manufacturer, but some manufacturer product
numbers are ambiguous and will not be found. A DKR product number will override a CT packagingPreference.

parameters.name: requestedQuantity
parameters.description:
The quantity of the product that you are interested in. This will be used to determined
the quantity to purchase in standard tape and reel, and also in your product preference for the remainder.

parameters.name: packagingPreference
parameters.description:
Can be either "CT" for Cut Tape or "DKR" for Digi-Reel. This will select what package
type to use for the remainder of quantity outside of a standard reel.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: OAuth Bearer Token. Please see<a href= "https://developer.digikey.com/documentation/oauth" target= "_blank" > OAuth 2.0 Documentation </a > page for more info.

parameters.name: X-DIGIKEY-Client-Id
parameters.description: The Client Id for your App.

parameters.name: X-DIGIKEY-Locale-Site
parameters.description: Two letter code for Digi-Key product website to search on. Different countries sites have different part restrictions, supported languages, and currencies. Acceptable values include: US, CA, JP, UK, DE, AT, BE, DK, FI, GR, IE, IT, LU, NL, NO, PT, ES, KR, HK, SG, CN, TW, AU, FR, IN, NZ, SE, MX, CH, IL, PL, SK, SI, LV, LT, EE, CZ, HU, BG, MY, ZA, RO, TH, PH.

parameters.name: X-DIGIKEY-Locale-Language
parameters.description: Two letter code for language to search on. Langauge must be supported by the selected site. If searching on keyword, this language is used to find matches. Acceptable values include: en, ja, de, fr, ko, zhs, zht, it, es, he, nl, sv, pl, fi, da, no.

parameters.name: X-DIGIKEY-Locale-Currency
parameters.description: Three letter code for Currency to return part pricing for. Currency must be supported by the selected site. Acceptable values include: USD, CAD, JPY, GBP, EUR, HKD, SGD, TWD, KRW, AUD, NZD, INR, DKK, NOK, SEK, ILS, CNY, PLN, CHF, CZK, HUF, RON, ZAR, MYR, THB, PHP.

parameters.name: X-DIGIKEY-Customer-Id
parameters.description: Your Digi-Key Customer id. If your account has multiple Customer Ids for different regions, this allows you to select one of them.

get.summary: Retrieve all media for a given product

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: OAuth Bearer Token. Please see<a href= "https://developer.digikey.com/documentation/oauth" target= "_blank" > OAuth 2.0 Documentation </a > page for more info.

parameters.name: X-DIGIKEY-Client-Id
parameters.description: The Client Id for your App.

parameters.name: X-DIGIKEY-Locale-Site
parameters.description: Two letter code for Digi-Key product website to search on. Different countries sites have different part restrictions, supported languages, and currencies. Acceptable values include: US, CA, JP, UK, DE, AT, BE, DK, FI, GR, IE, IT, LU, NL, NO, PT, ES, KR, HK, SG, CN, TW, AU, FR, IN, NZ, SE, MX, CH, IL, PL, SK, SI, LV, LT, EE, CZ, HU, BG, MY, ZA, RO, TH, PH.

parameters.name: X-DIGIKEY-Locale-Language
parameters.description: Two letter code for language to search on. Langauge must be supported by the selected site. If searching on keyword, this language is used to find matches. Acceptable values include: en, ja, de, fr, ko, zhs, zht, it, es, he, nl, sv, pl, fi, da, no.

parameters.name: X-DIGIKEY-Locale-Currency
parameters.description: Three letter code for Currency to return part pricing for. Currency must be supported by the selected site. Acceptable values include: USD, CAD, JPY, GBP, EUR, HKD, SGD, TWD, KRW, AUD, NZD, INR, DKK, NOK, SEK, ILS, CNY, PLN, CHF, CZK, HUF, RON, ZAR, MYR, THB, PHP.

parameters.name: X-DIGIKEY-Customer-Id
parameters.description: Your Digi-Key Customer id. If your account has multiple Customer Ids for different regions, this allows you to select one of them.

400.description: Bad Request - The input model is invalid or malformed.

401.description: Unauthorized - Token is expired or Client Id or subscription are invalid.

404.description: Not Found - The requested resource could not be found

429.description: Too Many Requests - Your rate limit has been exceeded

503.description: Service Unavailable - The service is temporarily unavailable

IsoSearchLocale.description: The validated locale that was used for the search. If the provided locale was invalid, this will show the corrections.

Site.description: The site used for the API call.

Language.description: The language used for the API call. If the provided language is not valid for the site, it will be set to the site default.

Currency.description: The currency used for the API call. If the provided currency is not valid for the site, it will be set to the site default.

Keywords.description: A String of Keywords, up to 250 characters

Limit.description: Number of products to return between 1 and 50.

Offset.description: The starting index of the records returned. This is used to paginate beyond RecordCount number of results.

QuantityAvailable.description: Quantity of the product available for immediate sale.

DetailedDescription.description: Extended catalog description of the product.

ManufacturerProductNumber.description:
The manufacturer part number. Note that some manufacturer part numbers may be used by multiple manufacturers for
different parts.

MinimumOrderQuantity.description: The minimum quantity to order from Digi-Key.

PrimaryDatasheetUrl.description: The URL to the product's datasheet.

PrimaryPhotoUrl.description: The URL to the product's image.

ProductStatus.description:
Status of the product. Options include: Active, Obsolete, Discontinued at Digi-Key,
Last Time Buy, Not For New Designs, Preliminary. For obsolete parts the part
will become a non-stocking item when stock is depleted; minimums will apply.
Order the quantity available or the quantity available plus a multiple of the
minimum order quantity.
///

ManufacturerLeadWeeks.description: The number of weeks expected to receive stock from manufacturer.

ManufacturerWarehouseQuantity.description: Quantity of this product available to order from manufacturer.

RohsStatus.description:
RoHS status. Can be RoHS Compliant, RoHS non-compliant, RoHS Compliant By Exemption, Not Applicable, Vendor
undefined, Request Inventory Verification, or ROHS3 Compliant.

QuantityOnOrder.description: Quantity of this product ordered but not immediately available.

StandardPricing.description: Standard pricing for the validated locale.

MyPricing.description: My pricing for the validated locale.

ProductUrl.description: Full URL of the Digi-Key catalog page to purchase the product. This is based on your provided Locale values.

MarketPlace.description: Is this product a marketplace product

StockNote.description:
Description of Digi-Key's current stocking status for the product. Possible values include: In Stock, Temporarily
Out of Stock, and Limited Supply - Call.

PackageTypeByQuantityResponse.description: Response from a PackageTypeByQuantity Search Service request

Products.description: List of products that matched the PackageTypeByQuantitySearchService request.

Field.description: Field in response to sort by

SortOrder.description: Direction to sort by Ascending or Descending
